Class BadKeyServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • HttpServlet
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.WebappServlet
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.BadKeyServlet

  • public class BadKeyServlet
extends WebappServlet
    Servlet to generate the fingerprints of ssh keys forbidden by this server It is unauthenticated as only hashes are published
